CustomField.description: Creates Today's Date in format January 1, 2018. Used for Outreach Program's mail merge doctor letters.
CustomField.formula: CASE( MONTH( TODAY() ) , 1, "January"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY()))&" "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 2,"February"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 3,"March"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 4, "April"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 5, "May"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 6, "June"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 7,"July"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 8, "August"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())) , 9,"September"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())) , 10, "October"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 11,"November"&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), 12,"December "&" "& TEXT(DAY(TODAY() ))&", "&TEXT(YEAR(TODAY() )), "Invalid Date")
CustomField.label: Today's Date
